game.name: Tiny Card Farm
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Tiny Card Farm is a cozy farming card game where you grow plants, raise animals and process your products by stacking cards. Discover new technologies, buy upgrades, complete tasks and become a prosperous farmer!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tiny Card Farm is a cozy farming card game where you grow plants, raise animals and process your products by stacking cards. Discover new technologies, buy upgrades, complete tasks and become a prosperous farmer!
